meanings.sent1: I love wearing my cozy woollies on cold days.
meanings.sent2: She knitted a beautiful pair of woollies for her granddaughter.
meanings.sent3: The colorful woollies made the snowman look stylish.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of woollies was like a rainbow in the closet.
meanings.sent5: The softness of the woollies against my skin was pure comfort.

meanings.sent1: The store sells a variety of woollies for knitting enthusiasts.
meanings.sent2: She bought some high-quality woollies to make a warm scarf.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the ball of woollies, unraveling it in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The woollies in the basket were waiting to be turned into a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The texture of the woollies was perfect for crafting a soft sweater.

meanings.sent1: Don't forget your woollies when you go out in the snow.
meanings.sent2: She lost one of her favorite woollies while skiing.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy chewed on the woollies, leaving holes in them.
meanings.sent4: Her woollies kept her hands warm during the winter hike.
meanings.sent5: The colorful woollies added a fun touch to her winter outfit.
